userStories.title: Example Story 1
userStories.description: Implement the first feature of the project. This story should be specific enough to complete in a single context window.
spec: Clarify key behaviors or constraints for this story
Add implementation notes the agent should follow
acceptanceCriteria: Feature is implemented according to specification
Unit tests are written and passing

userStories.title: Example Story 2
userStories.description: Implement the second feature. Each story should be atomic and independently verifiable.
userStories.spec: Single spec line is also supported as a string
acceptanceCriteria: Feature is implemented according to specification
